#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
int count(char a,char arr[],char ar1[],int l)
{
int p=0,o=0,r=0;
for(int k=0;k<l;k++)
{
if(arr[k]==a)
p++;

if(ar1[k]==a)
o++;
}
if(p==o)
{ r=1;
}
return r;
}
int main()
{
int n,u;
cin>>n;
int i,a;
int j;
int q;
char **str1=new char *[n];
char **str=new char *[n];
for(q=0;q<n;q++)
{
str1[q] =new char[21];
str[q]=new char[21];
cin>>str1[q];
cin>>str[q];
}
for(u=0;u<n;u++)
{
a=0;
if(strlen(str1[u])==strlen(str[u]))
{
for(i=0;i<strlen(str[u]);i++)
{
if(count(str1[u][i],str1[u],str[u],strlen(str[u]))!=1)
{
a=0;
break;
}
else
a++;
}
}
if(a!=0)
{
cout<<"YES";
cout<<"\n";
}
else
{
cout<<"NO";

cout<<"\n";
}
}
for(i=0;i<n;i++)
{
delete str1[i];
delete str[i];
}
delete str1;
delete str;
return 0;
}
